parameters.name: _metadata
parameters.description: Additional metadata to be included with response.

operations.description:
Returns a ChemSpider URL corresponding to an input SMILES string. Driven by ChemSpider.
        
Response template:

?primaryTopic rdf:type ?searchType ;
         cs_api_search:Molecule ?moleculeSmiles ;
         cs_api:result ?result ;
         cs_api_search:MatchType ?searchMatchType ;
         cs_api_common:Complexity ?complexity ;
         cs_api_common:Isotopic ?isotopic ;
         cs_api_common:HasSpectra ?hasSpectra ;
         cs_api_common:HasPatents ?hasPatents ;
         cs_api_result:Limit ?limit ;
         cs_api_result:Start ?start ;
         cs_api_result:Length ?length

parameters.name: commonOptions.Complexity
parameters.description: (Not supported at the moment) 0: Any ; 1: Single ; 2: Multi

parameters.name: commonOptions.Isotopic
parameters.description: (Not supported at the moment) 0: Any ; 1: Labeled ; 2: NotLabeled

parameters.name: resultOptions.Length
parameters.description: Integer. How many results should be returned starting from Start index. Default value: -1.

parameters.name: _metadata
parameters.description: Additional metadata to be included with response.

operations.description:
Returns a ChemSpider URL corresponding to an input InChIKey string. Driven by ChemSpider.
        
Response template:

?primaryTopic chemspider:inchikey ?inchi_key

parameters.name: _metadata
parameters.description: Additional metadata to be included with response.

operations.description:
Returns a ChemSpider URL corresponding to an input InChI string. Driven by ChemSpider.
        
Response template:

?primaryTopic chemspider:inchi ?inchi

parameters.name: _metadata
parameters.description: Additional metadata to be included with response.

operations.description:
Returns a set of ChemSpider compound URLs, similar to the input molecule according to the specified algorithm and threshold. Driven by ChemSpider.
        
Response template:

?primaryTopic rdf:type ?searchType ;
         cs_api_search:Molecule ?inputMoleculeSmiles ;
         cs_api:result ?similarMolecule ;
         cs_api_search:Threshold ?searchThreshold ;
         cs_api_search:SimilarityType ?searchSimilarityType ;
         cs_api_search:Alpha ?searchAlpha ;
         cs_api_search:Beta ?searchBeta ;
         cs_api_common:Complexity ?complexity ;
         cs_api_common:Isotopic ?isotopic ;
         cs_api_common:HasSpectra ?hasSpectra ;
         cs_api_common:HasPatents ?hasPatents ;
         cs_api_result:Limit ?limit ;
         cs_api_result:Start ?start ;
         cs_api_result:Length ?length

parameters.name: searchOptions.Alpha
parameters.description: Value in [0,1] ; Default=0.5 ; available only for Tversky metric (for the other types it will be ignored)

parameters.name: searchOptions.Beta
parameters.description: Value in [0,1] ; Default=0.5 ; available only for Tversky metric (for the other types it will be ignored)

parameters.name: commonOptions.Complexity
parameters.description: (Not supported at the moment) 0: Any ; 1: Single ; 2: Multi

parameters.name: commonOptions.Isotopic
parameters.description: (Not supported at the moment) 0: Any ; 1: Labeled ; 2: NotLabeled

parameters.name: resultOptions.Limit
parameters.description: Integer. Search limit. Specefy how many results return back during the search. Default value: -1 .

parameters.name: resultOptions.Start
parameters.description: Integer. Return results starting the index. Default value: 0

parameters.name: resultOptions.Length
parameters.description: Integer. How many results should be returned starting from Start index. Default value: -1.

parameters.name: _metadata
parameters.description: Additional metadata to be included with response.

operations.description:
Returns a ChemSpider URL corresponding to an input SMILES string. Driven by ChemSpider.
        
Response template:

?primaryTopic chemspider:smiles ?smiles

parameters.name: _metadata
parameters.description: Additional metadata to be included with response.

operations.description:
Returns a set of ChemSpider compound URLs that contain the specified structure. Driven by ChemSpider.
        
Response template:

?primaryTopic rdf:type ?searchType ;
         cs_api_search:Molecule ?inputMoleculeSmiles ;
         cs_api:result ?resultMolecule ;
         cs_api:search:MolType ?searchMolType ;
         cs_api_search:MatchTautomers ?searchMatchTautomers ;         
         cs_api_common:Complexity ?complexity ;
         cs_api_common:Isotopic ?isotopic ;
         cs_api_common:HasSpectra ?hasSpectra ;
         cs_api_common:HasPatents ?hasPatents ;
         cs_api_result:Limit ?limit ;
         cs_api_result:Start ?start ;
         cs_api_result:Length ?length

parameters.name: searchOptions.MatchTautomers
parameters.description: (Not supported at the moment) Search exactly for the given tautomeric form and ignore others. Not supported at the moment . Boolean

parameters.name: commonOptions.Complexity
parameters.description: (Not supported at the moment) 0: Any ; 1: Single ; 2: Multi

parameters.name: commonOptions.Isotopic
parameters.description: (Not supported at the moment) 0: Any ; 1: Labeled ; 2: NotLabeled

parameters.name: resultOptions.Limit
parameters.description: Integer. Search limit. Specify how many results return back during the search. Default value: -1 .

parameters.name: resultOptions.Start
parameters.description: Integer. Return results starting the index. Default value: 0

parameters.name: resultOptions.Length
parameters.description: Integer. How many results should be returned starting from Start index. Default value: -1.

parameters.name: _metadata
parameters.description: Additional metadata to be included with response.

operations.description:
Get the description of a concept, based on a concept URL. Driven by ConceptWiki.
        
Response template:

?conceptURL skos:prefLabel ?conceptPrefLabel ;
     skos:altLabel ?conceptAltLabel ;
     ops_api:semanticTag ?tagBNode ;            
     skos:exactMatch ?urlBNode ;
     skos:definition ?definitionText .
?tagBNode cw:uuid tagUUID ;
     skos:prefLabel ?tagPrefLabel ;
     cw:deleted ?deletedFromWikiMarker .
     skos:altLabel ?tagAltLabel ;
?urlBNode cw:url ?url ;
     cw:matchType ?matchType ;
     void:inDataset ?sourceURL ;
?sourceURL skos:prefLabel ?sourcePrefLabel ;
     cw:deleted ?deletedFromWikiMarker

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the concept; required. E.g. 8e3a87ae-345d-4c25-bd7a-5b3221c6e3fa

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: The search results will be filtered by this source authority; optional. Possible values: 1 = Community, 2 = UMLS, 3 = SwissProt, 4 = ChemSpider, 5 = ConceptWiki

parameters.name: _metadata
parameters.description: Additional metadata to be included with response.

operations.summary: Map free text to a concept URL based on semantic tag
operations.description:
Search for a set of concept URLs based on free text and an input tag, which specifies the semantic type. Driven by ConceptWiki.
        
Response template:

?primaryTopic rdf:type ?searchType ;
     ops_api:searchTerm ?searchTerm ;
     ops_api:tagUUID ?inputTagUUID ;
     ops_api:result ?uuidURL ;
     ops_api:limit ?resultsLimit .
?uuidURL skos:prefLabel ?conceptPrefLabel ;
     ops_api:match ?match ;
     ops_api:semanticTag ?tagBNode ;            
     skos:altLabel ?conceptAltLabel ;            
     skos:exactMatch ?urlBNode .
?tagBNode cw:uuid tagUUID ;
     skos:prefLabel ?tagPrefLabel ;
     cw:deleted ?deletedFromWikiMarker ;
     skos:altLabel ?tagAltLabel .
?urlBNode cw:url ?url ;
     cw:matchType ?matchType

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Query; required. Minimum length is 3 characters. E.g. water

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limits the number of results; optional. Minimum value is 1, maximum value is common sense. Default value is 10.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the tag concept; required. Specifies the 'semantic type' required for the search results. E.g. 07a84994-e464-4bbf-812a-a4b96fa3d197

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: The search results will be filtered by this source authority; optional. Possible values: 1 = Community, 2 = UMLS, 3 = SwissProt, 4 = ChemSpider, 5 = ConceptWiki

parameters.name: _metadata
parameters.description: Additional metadata to be included with response.

operations.summary: Map free text to a concept URL
operations.description:
Returns a set of concept URLs associated to the input free text. Driven by ConceptWiki.
        
Response template:

?primaryTopic rdf:type ?searchType ;    
     ops_api:searchTerm ?searchTerm ;
     ops_api:result ?uuidURL ;
     ops_api:limit ?resultsLimit .
?uuidURL skos:prefLabel ?conceptPrefLabel ;
     ops_api:match ?match ;
     skos:altLabel ?conceptAltLabel ;
     ops_api:semanticTag ?tagBNode ;            
     skos:exactMatch ?urlBNode .
?tagBNode cw:uuid tagUUID ;
     skos:prefLabel ?tagPrefLabel ;
     cw:deleted ?deletedFromWikiMarker .
     skos:altLabel ?tagAltLabel ;
?urlBNode cw:url ?url ;
     cw:matchType ?matchType

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Query; required. Mininum length is 3 characters. E.g. water

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limits the number of results; optional. Minimum value is 1, maximum value is common sense. Default value is 10.

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: The search results will be filtered by this source authority; optional. Possible values: 1 = Community, 2 = UMLS, 3 = SwissProt, 4 = ChemSpider, 5 = ConceptWiki

parameters.name: _metadata
parameters.description: Additional metadata to be included with response.

operations.description:
Returns a set of URLs associated to the input URL.
        
Response template:

?primaryTopic skos:exactMatch ?url

parameters.name: URL
parameters.description: An input URL to be mapped.

parameters.name: targetURISpace
parameters.description: List of URI spaces separated by '|' characters. Restricts the results to targets in this/these URISpace(s). The URI space of a URL is the one defined when the mapping is loaded. E.g. http://www.conceptwiki.org/concept/

parameters.name: _metadata
parameters.description: Additional metadata to be included with response.

operations.description:
The total number of acitivity values in the LDC for a given ChEBI Ontology class.
        
Response template:

?ops_item ops:chebiPharmacologyTotalResults ?count

parameters.name: target_organism
parameters.description: A literal target organism in ChEMBL.

parameters.name: activity_type
parameters.description: One of the activity types listed at /pharmacology/filters/activities

parameters.name: activity_value
parameters.description: Return activity values equal to this number.

parameters.name: activity_unit
parameters.description: The unit in which {activity_value} is given. See /pharmacology/filters/units/{activity_type} for allowed valued. For e.g. IC50: /pharmacology/filters/units/IC50

parameters.name: pChembl
parameters.description: The pChembl value of an activity

parameters.name: _metadata
parameters.description: Additional metadata to be included with response.

operations.description:
A page of items corresponding to acitivity values for a given ChEBI Ontology class
    
Response template:

?item chembl:hasMolecule ?compound_chembl ;
    chembl:standardType ?std_type ;
    chembl:standardRelation ?relation ;
    chembl:standardValue ?std_value ;
    chembl:standardUnits ?std_unit ;
    chembl:publishedType ?published_type ;
    chembl:publishedRelation ?published_relation ;
    chembl:publishedValue ?published_value ;
    chembl:publishedUnits ?published_unit ;
    chembl:hasQUDT ?qudt_uri ;
    chembl:hasAssay ?assay_uri ;
    chembl:pChembl ?pChembl ;
    chembl:hasDocument ?doi ;
    bibo:pmid ?pmid ;
    void:inDataset <http://www.ebi.ac.uk/chembl> .
?assay_uri chembl:hasTarget ?target_uri ;
    chembl:assayOrganismName ?assay_organism ;
    dcterms:description ?assay_description ;
    void:inDataset <http://www.ebi.ac.uk/chembl> .
?target_uri dcterms:title ?target_name ;
    chembl:targetOrganismName ?target_organism ;
    void:inDataset <http://www.ebi.ac.uk/chembl> .
?compound_chembl skos:exactMatch ?compound_cw ;
    skos:exactMatch ?class .
?compound_cw skos:prefLabel ?compound_name ;
    void:inDataset <http://www.conceptwiki.org> .
?compound_chembl skos:exactMatch ?compound_cs .
?compound_cs chemspider:smiles ?smiles ;
    chemspider:inchi ?inchi ;
    chemspider:inchikey ?inchiKey ;
    ops:ro5_violations ?num_ro5_violations ;
    void:inDataset <http://rdf.chemspider.com> .
?compound_chembl ?full_mwt ?molweight ;
    void:inDataset <http://www.ebi.ac.uk/chembl>

parameters.name: target_organism
parameters.description: A literal target organism in ChEMBL.

parameters.name: activity_type
parameters.description: One of the activity types listed at /pharmacology/filters/activities

parameters.name: activity_value
parameters.description: Return activity values equal to this number.

parameters.name: activity_unit
parameters.description: The unit in which {activity_value} is given. See /pharmacology/filters/units/{activity_type} for allowed valued. For e.g. IC50: /pharmacology/filters/units/IC50

parameters.name: pChembl
parameters.description: The pChembl value of an activity

parameters.name: _page
parameters.description: A number; the page that should be viewed

parameters.name: _pageSize
parameters.description: The desired page size. Set to all to retrieve all results in a single page.

parameters.name: _orderBy
parameters.description: The desired variable to sort by. Multiple values can be specified seperated by spaces. Direction of sort can be specified with ASC(?var) and DESC(?var). Default is ascending

parameters.name: _metadata
parameters.description: Additional metadata to be included with response.

operations.description:
Returns information about a single compound that corresponds to {uri}.
        
Response template:

?ops_item skos:exactMatch ?cw_uri .
?cw_uri skos:prefLabel ?compound_name ;
void:inDataset <http://www.conceptwiki.org> .
?ops_item skos:exactMatch ?cs_uri .
?cs_uri chemspider:smiles ?smiles ;
     chemspider:inchi ?inchi ;
chemspider:inchikey ?inchiKey ;
     ops:logp ?alogp ;
     ops:hba ?hba ;
     ops:hbd ?hbd ;
     ops:ro5_violations ?num_ro5_violations ;
     ops:psa ?psa;
     void:inDataset <http://www.chemspider.com> .
?ops_item skos:exactMatch ?chembl_uri .
?chembl_uri ?bNode1 ?molformula ;
         ?bNode2 ?molweight ;
         ?bNode3 ?mw_freebase ;
         ?bNode4 ?rtb ;
         void:inDataset <http://www.ebi.ac.uk/chembl>.
?ops_item skos:exactMatch ?db_uri .
?db_uri drugbank:biotransformation ?biotransformation ;
     drugbank:description ?description ;
     drugbank:proteinBinding ?proteinBinding ;
     drugbank:toxicity ?toxicity ;
     drugbank:meltingPoint ?meltingPoint ;
     void:inDataset <http://linkedlifedata.com/resource/drugbank>

parameters.name: _metadata
parameters.description: Additional metadata to be included with response.

The total number of acitivity values in the LDC for a given compound

chembl:publishedValue ?published_value ;
chembl:publishedUnits ?published_unit ;
chembl:standardType ?standard_type ;

     chembl:onAssay ?assay_uri ;

?equiv_assay chembl:hasTarget ?targetUri ;

?equiv_target dcterms:title ?target_name ;

void:inDataset <http://www.ebi.ac.uk/chembl> .

?cw_uri skos:prefLabel ?compound_name ;
     void:inDataset <http://www.conceptwiki.org/> .
?equiv_compound skos:exactMatch ?cs_uri .
?cs_uri chemspider:smiles ?smiles ;

     ops:ro5_violations ?num_ro5_violations ;
     void:inDataset <http://rdf.chemspider.com/> .
?equiv_compound ?bNode1 ?molweight ;
         void:inDataset <http://www.ebi.ac.uk/chembl> .
?equiv_compound skos:exactMatch ?db_uri .
?db_uri drugbank:drugType ?drugType ;
     drugbank:genericName ?drug_name ;
     void:inDataset <http://linkedlifedata.com/resource/drugbank>

parameters.description: The desired variable to sort by. Multiple values can be specified seperated by spaces. Direction of sort can be specified with ASC(?var) and DESC(?var). Default is ascending

operations.description:
Returns information about a single target that corresponds to {uri}.
        
Response template:

?ops_item skos:exactMatch ?cw_uri ;
     skos:exactMatch ?uniprot_uri ;
     skos:exactMatch ?chembl_uri ;
     skos:exactMatch ?db_uri .
?cw_uri skos:prefLabel ?target_name ;
     void:inDataset <http://www.conceptwiki.org> .
?uniprot_uri uniprot:existence ?existence ;
     uniprot:organism ?organism ;
     uniprot:sequence ?sequence ;
     uniprot:Function_Annotation ?function ;
     uniprot:classifiedWith ?class ;
     uniprot:alternativeName ?alt_names ;
     rdfs:seeAlso ?target_pdb ;
void:inDataset <http://purl.uniprot.org> .
?chembl_uri chembl:hasTargetComponent ?targetComponent ;
     rdf:type ?target_type ;
     rdfs:label ?synonym ;    
     void:inDataset <http://www.ebi.ac.uk/chembl> .
?targetComponent dcterms:description ?description ;
?db_uri drugbank:cellularLocation ?cellularLocation ;
     drugbank:molecularWeight ?molecularWeight ;
     drugbank:numberOfResidues ?numberOfResidues ;
     drugbank:theoreticalPi ?theoreticalPi ;
void:inDataset <http://linkedlifedata.com/resource/drugbank>

parameters.name: _metadata
parameters.description: Additional metadata to be included with response.

operations.description:
The total number of acitivity values in the LDC for a given target
        
Response template:

?ops_item ops:targetPharmacologyTotalResults ?count

parameters.name: target_organism
parameters.description: A literal target organism in ChEMBL.

parameters.name: activity_type
parameters.description: One of the activity types listed at /pharmacology/filters/activities

parameters.name: activity_value
parameters.description: Return activity values equal to this number.

parameters.name: activity_unit
parameters.description: The unit in which {activity_value} is given. See /pharmacology/filters/units/{activity_type} for allowed valued. For e.g. IC50: /pharmacology/filters/units/IC50

parameters.name: assay_organism
parameters.description: A literal assay organism in ChEMBL.

parameters.name: pChembl
parameters.description: The pChembl value of an activity

parameters.name: _metadata
parameters.description: Additional metadata to be included with response.

operations.description:
A page of items corresponding to acitivity values in the LDC for a given target
    
Response template:

?item chembl:forMolecule ?equiv_compound;
     chembl:type ?std_type;
     chembl:relation ?relation;
     chembl:standardValue ?std_value;
     chembl:standardUnits ?std_unit;
     chembl-ops:normalisedValue ?activity_value ;
     chembl:onAssay ?equiv_assay ;
     bibo:pmid ?pmid ;
     chembl:citesAsDataSource ?doi ;
     void:inDataset <http://www.ebi.ac.uk/chembl> .
?equiv_assay chembl:hasTarget ?equiv_target ;
     chembl:organism ?assay_organism ;
     chembl:hasDescription ?assay_description ;
void:inDataset <http://www.ebi.ac.uk/chembl> .
?equiv_target dc:title ?target_name ;
     ops:target_organism ?target_organism ;
     skos:exactMatch ?cw_uri ;
     void:inDataset <http://www.ebi.ac.uk/chembl> .
?cw_uri skos:prefLabel ?target_name ;
void:inDataset <http://www.conceptwiki.org/> .
?equiv_compound ?node1 ?molweight ;
     skos:exactMatch ?compound_cs ;
     skos:exactMatch ?compound_cw ;
     void:inDataset <http://www.ebi.ac.uk/chembl> .
?compound_cs chemspider:smiles ?smiles ;
     chemspider:inchi ?inchi ;
     chemspider:inchikey ?inchi_key;
ops:ro5_violations ?num_ro5_violations ;
     void:inDataset <http://rdf.chemspider.com/> .
?compound_cw skos:prefLabel ?compound_name ;
     void:inDataset <http://www.conceptwiki.org/>

parameters.description: A literal target organism in ChEMBL.

            ?parent rdfs:label ?parent_name

?item chembl:hasMolecule ?compound_chembl;
         chembl:publishedType ?published_type ;
         chembl:publishedRelation ?published_relation ;
         chembl:publishedValue ?published_value ;
         chembl:publishedUnits ?published_unit ;
         chembl:standardType ?std_type ;
         chembl:standardRelation ?relation ;
         chembl:standardValue ?std_value ;
         chembl:standardUnits ?std_unit ;
         chembl:hasQUDT ?qudt_uri;
         chembl:hasAssay ?assay_uri ;
         chembl:pChembl ?pChembl ;
         bibo:pmid ?pmid ;

         void:inDataset <http://www.ebi.ac.uk/chembl> .
    ?assay_uri chembl:assayOrganismName ?assay_organism ;
         chembl:hasTarget ?target_uri ;
         dcterms:description ?assay_description ;
         void:inDataset <http://www.ebi.ac.uk/chembl> .
    ?target_uri chembl:hasProteinClassification ?class ;
         dcterms:title ?target_name ;
         chembl:targetOrganismName ?target_organism ;
         void:inDataset <http://www.ebi.ac.uk/chembl> .
    ?compound_chembl ?full_mwt ?molweight ;

         chemspider:inchi ?inchi ;

         ops:ro5_violations ?num_ro5_violations ;
         void:inDataset <http://rdf.chemspider.com/> .
    ?compound_cw skos:prefLabel ?compound_name ;
         void:inDataset <http://www.conceptwiki.org/>
